short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The tool that helps you do wonders with elaticsearch for newbies and experts alike.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The perfect tool you'll need the work with querying elasticsearch.

What can this app do?
☀ Query elasticsearch with a basic json editor that is syntax highlighted
☀ Query elasticsearch with a query builder for people new to elasticsearch.
   ☀ The Query Builder can
        ★ Build must,should and must-not query
        ★ Build basic term aggregations
        ★ Include / limit returned fields from query
        ★ Set size and range or results returned..
☀ Editor theming support

v0.5
☀ Save es urls
☀ Download outputs as csv
☀ _all field added to query builder

v0.51
Bug fixes in saving urls
